local_intent: Align to the bread and execute the grasp using the precomputed bread_grasp, confirming a stable hold.
assumptions: bread_grasp key exists with a valid pose
Bread is visible for final alignment
Collision-free approach above bread is available
coherence_with_global: Matches the grasp phase of the global plan: verify visibility and pose, align, pick with grasp_key bread_grasp, then verify stability.
